channel.title: Help plese about my 508 server look!
channel.description:
when i click run on my cient it gets stuck on [ connecting updating server ] then i looked in help place and it says to rune ur server u need to rune server before cilent so i i went into my server files and in to CMD and i saw lots of run on the top rs2.cmd and some other cmds all the way on the bottom i saw run.cmd then i clicked it and it says CANNOT FIND THE PATH SPECIFIED CLICK ANY KEY TO CONTINUE and nothing happed i would have shown you some pics but i dont know how to instert it =p
PLESE REPLY I WANT A SEREVRE REALLY BADLY TY FOR YOUR TIME
=]

item.title: Help plese about my 508 server look!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

yeha thanks for that but i did that ages ago if i know how to put images in i would have

tell em and ill show i done that i put in it used to be

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

when i changed it it is

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_11\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

and it still DONT WORK HELP i would have put in pics but dont know how =p

o yeah and i got jdk and jre

Read full topic
item.source: Help plese about my 508 server look!

item.title: Help plese about my 508 server look!
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

that is what it use to be?
now trace the classpath indicated in the run.bat and look in your computer…
"C:\Program Files\Java… until you reach the java folder. open it look at what type of java you have(it might be java developement kit:jdk. or it could be jre: java runtime enviroment)…
if you have jre and jdk anyone of them will work which ever one you have and put jdk6.0_11 instead of jdk6.0_07.

I hope to have been of any help to you
~zofis7

Read full topic
